Most Illustrious Sir

On the 8th, Senhor Freire will march with the ranks of the 1st Battalion to take command of that plaza, when Your Lordship will hand over to Senhor Freire two deserters from his battalion, which Your Lordship Flor and I am certain of its content and the contumacy of the two captains of the 2nd Corps not to march according to the orders of their lieutenant-colonel commander of the 2nd Corps, who ordered them to march without fail and to take horses from the neighbors to make their march; therefore, it is appropriate that Your Lordship Batista and Carcerero do so, and send them to Rio Grande under the orders of the Most Excellent Sir.

God keep Your Lordship  
Canguçu, July 7, 1844  
Most Illustrious Sir Luís José Ferreira  
Lieutenant-Colonel Commander of the 8th Battalion  
Francisco Pedro de Abreu
